Home About

About Us

Why Tinker? Our Vision Our mission

A Tinkerer is someone who also enjoys experimenting.

We, at Tinkerers’ Laboratory are always open for people with an aim to grow, innovators and thinkers alike, converting their creative ideas into actual engineering products. We enable them to do whatever they love to do, let them have limitless hands-on experience and spend hours tinkering without any worries. So if you are enthralled by machines and technology, Tinkerers’ Laboratory is the place to be.

Tinkerers' Laboratory converts creative ideas into engineering products

Tinkerers’ Laboratory aims to provide hands on experience to help students become innovators converting their creative ideas into actual engineering products and start a national trend towards “Making”.

Boost student participation and quality of the projects

Increase student participation in technical activities, improve quality of projects built and expand the idea of TL to other engineering schools in Mumbai and later in other parts of country.
